subject: RE: TIEMPO-361 Verification - Partial masteredCountryName
body:
Hi Fulton,

Verified local events via GET /api/events. Results:

✅ masteredCityName - Present
✅ masteredCityGeolocation - Present (GeoJSON Point)
✅ masteredDivisionName - Present
✅ masteredRegionName - Present
⚠️ masteredCountryName - PARTIAL (some null, some 'United States')
✅ venueGeolocation - Present

Example:
- 'Practica Chiquita at Ultimate Tango' → masteredCountryName: null
- 'Sal Azul Milonga' → masteredCountryName: 'United States'

Questions:
1. Does Event CREATE (POST) auto-populate masteredCountryName from venue chain?
2. Does Event UPDATE (PUT) refresh these fields if venue changes?
3. Should we run another backfill on local/TEST to match PROD?

The FE aggregation code (useEventDensity.js) uses masteredCountryName for continent grouping, so null values will fall into 'Unknown' bucket.

— Sarah
